Package org.platanios.learn.math.matrix

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CholeskyDecomposition
    Implements the Cholesky decomposition algorithm for matrix \(A\).
    CholeskyDecompositionTest  
    DenseVector
    Implements a class representing dense vectors and supporting operations related to them.
    HashVector
    Implements a class representing sparse vectors and supporting operations related to them.
    LUDecomposition
    Implements the LU decomposition algorithm for matrix \(A\).
    LUDecompositionTest  
    Matrix
    Implements a class representing matrices and supporting operations related to matrices.
    MatrixUtilities  
    QRDecomposition
    Implements the QR decomposition algorithm for matrix \(A\).
    QRDecompositionTest  
    SingularValueDecomposition
    Implements the singular value decomposition (SVD) algorithm for matrix \(A\).
    SingularValueDecompositionTest  
    SparseVector
    Implements a class representing sparse vectors and supporting operations related to them.
    Vector
    Interface for classes representing vectors and supporting operations related to vectors.
    Vectors
    This class provides several static methods to build vectors of different types and initialize them in various ways.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    VectorNorm
    An enumeration of the supported norm operators for vectors.
    VectorType
    This enumeration contains the different types of vectors that are supported.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    NonPositiveDefiniteMatrixException  
    NonSymmetricMatrixException  
    SingularMatrixException
